hints.content:
The bottom bar lines up to $\purpleD{7}$.   

![A horizontal bar graph. Number of vegetables is on the horizontal axis and has lines marking from 0 to 10. Type of Vegetable is on the vertical axis.  There are bars for each of the Types of Vegetables. The bottom bar is 7. The second bar is 8. The third bar is 10. The fourth bar is 9. The bottom bar is labeled 7 at the right.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8a89c6d5810afaae81b9253892738233f7264a51)

Which type of vegetable has $\purpleD{7}$ in Carolina's garden?

Type of vegetable | Number
:- | :-: 
Potatoes | $7$ 

The garden has $\purpleD{7}$ potatoes.  So, the bottom bar should be labeled $\purpleD{\text{Potatoes}}$.
Now let's label the other bars to match the table.

Here is the completed graph:

![A horizontal bar graph. Number of vegetables is on the horizontal axis and has lines marking from 0 to 10. Type of Vegetable is on the vertical axis.  There are bars for each of the Types of Vegetables. The bottom bar labeled Potatoes is 7. The second bar labeled Tomatoes is 8. The third bar labeled Peppers is 10. The fourth bar labeled Lettuce is 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/44f3b297ac11d505b4bb8ff0df89973dc045aaca)

question.content:
Carolina created a chart and a bar graph to show how many different vegetables she has in her garden.

Type of vegetable | Number
:- | :-: 
Tomatoes | $8$ 
Peppers | $10$ 
Potatoes | $7$ 
Lettuce | $9$ 

**Label each bar on the bar graph.**

[[â˜ƒ label-image 1]]

options.imageAlt: A horizontal bar graph. Number of vegetables is on the horizontal axis and has lines marking from 0 to 10. Type of Vegetable is on the vertical axis.  There are bars for each of the Types of Vegetables. The bottom bar is 7. The second bar is 8. The third bar is 10. The fourth bar is 9.
